description:
It`s incredibly hot, and the Narutaki-so residents decide to go to the beach. They have fun in the water together, split a watermelon, then hold a seafood barbecue. At the end of the day, Kozue and Ryushi watch the sunset together.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s Summer! The Sea! Sea Bathing!
Natsu Da! Mizugi Da! Kaisuiyoku Da!
夏だ! 水着だ! 海水浴だ!
